summary: Web application with PWA (Progressive Web App) features
architectural_notes: PWA implementation required for installable app experience
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App icon suitable for PWA with transparent background, modern geometric design incorporating fox motif (icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
- High-resolution app icon for PWA with transparent background, modern geometric design incorporating fox motif (icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
- Maskable app icon with safe zone padding, centered fox motif on solid background (icon-maskable-192.dim_192x192.png)
- High-resolution maskable app icon with safe zone padding, centered fox motif on solid background (icon-maskable-512.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Update the PWA manifest (frontend/public/manifest.json) to include all required fields for installability: start_url, scope, orientation preference, and comprehensive icon sizes (192x192, 512x512) with purpose annotations for maskable and any

Enhance the service worker (frontend/public/sw.js) to implement a proper offline-first strategy with runtime caching for video thumbnails and API responses, while maintaining the existing exclusions for Internet Identity and IC mainnet URLs
Add an install prompt component to the frontend that detects when the PWA is installable and displays a user-friendly banner or button encouraging users to install the app to their home screen

Update frontend/index.html to include comprehensive PWA meta tags including apple-mobile-web-app-capable, apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style, and proper theme-color meta tags for enhanced mobile experience

Improve the offline fallback page (frontend/public/offline.html) to include helpful information about offline functionality, cached content availability, and a more engaging visual design consistent with the Saanufox brand

new_feature_requests.summary: Add PWA support with manifest and service worker
